summary: Provides a compute task that ingests CellVoyager microscopy files, extracts channel and ROI information, constructs multiscale image pyramids using Dask, and writes the resulting data into an existing OME-NGFF Zarr array with appropriate metadata.
business_intent: Facilitates the integration of CellVoyager imaging data into the OME-NGFF standard, enabling scalable storage, cloudâ€‘compatible access, and downstream analysis or visualization of microscopy datasets.
